title: 87/543/ECSC: Commission Decision of 9 November 1987 establishing the delivery levels of ECSC steel products of Portuguese origin onto the rest of the Community market, excluding Spain (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 9 November 1987
establishing the delivery levels of ECSC steel products of Portuguese origin onto the rest of the Community market, excluding Spain
(Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
(87/543/ECSC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Deliveries of ECSC steel products of Portuguese origin onto the rest of the Community market, excluding Spain, may not exceed 100 000 tonnes during 1987.
This Decision is addressed to the Republic of Portugal.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 November 1987.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Vice-President
